name: Gazelle Indoor Shoes
label: Shoes
heading: ICONIC GAZELLE SHOES MADE WITH SUPPLE SUEDE
bodyText: These adidas Gazelle Indoor shoes give you comfort and retro style, with a premium suede upper and two-color 3-Stripes. Originally designed as an indoor soccer training shoe, these kicks pay homage to how far the Gazelle has come since its debut.

name: Denim Track Top
label: Winter
heading: A LOOSE-FIT TRACK TOP FOR EFFORTLESS EVERYDAY LAYERING
bodyText: Made from soft denim that gets better with age, this adidas Essentials track top blends classic sporty elements with a modern, easygoing vibe. Leave it open or zip it up. The choice is yours. However you wear it, this loose-fitting top is ready to go wherever your day takes you.The cotton in this product has been sourced through Better Cotton. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products.

name: Tiro Pants
label: Pants
heading: A LOOSE-FIT TRACK TOP FOR EFFORTLESS EVERYDAY LAYERING
bodyText: Bring the spirit of soccer to your daily hustle. These adidas Tiro pants have tapered legs with ankle zips for a sleek silhouette and move-with-you feel as you run errands or meet up with friends. Zip pockets keep your essentials close at hand.Made with a series of recycled materials, and at least 70% recycled content, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

name: Classic Hoodie
label: Hoodies
heading: A CLASSIC HOODIE FOR EVERYDAY COMFORT
bodyText: This classic hoodie combines soft fabric with a simple design, making it a versatile layer for all your casual looks. Whether you're lounging at home or out on the streets, this hoodie has you covered.

name: Lightweight Summer Jacket
label: Jackets
heading: A LIGHTWEIGHT JACKET FOR COOL SUMMER EVENINGS
bodyText: Perfect for those cool summer evenings, this lightweight jacket offers a breathable design with a stylish look. The water-resistant fabric keeps you dry, while the adjustable hood provides extra coverage.

name: Performance Running Shorts
label: Sports
heading: BREATHABLE RUNNING SHORTS FOR YOUR DAILY RUNS
bodyText: Stay cool and comfortable during your runs with these performance shorts. Featuring moisture-wicking fabric and a supportive inner brief, these shorts are designed to keep you moving without distractions.

name: Graphic Tee
label: Shirts
heading: A GRAPHIC TEE FOR EVERY OCCASION
bodyText: Express yourself with this graphic tee, featuring bold designs and comfortable fabric. Whether you're out with friends or just lounging at home, this tee adds a pop of personality to any outfit.

name: Basic Beanie
label: Accessories
heading: A WARM BEANIE FOR WINTER DAYS
bodyText: Keep your head warm during the cold months with this cozy beanie. Made from soft knit fabric, it's perfect for adding a touch of style while staying comfortable.

name: Sporty Cap
label: Accessories
heading: A STYLISH CAP FOR SPORTS AND CASUAL WEAR
bodyText: Top off your sporty look with this versatile cap. Featuring an adjustable strap for a perfect fit, this cap is great for workouts, outdoor activities, or everyday wear.

name: Slim Fit Shirt
label: Shirts
heading: A SLIM-FIT SHIRT FOR A SHARP LOOK
bodyText: This slim-fit shirt offers a tailored silhouette that flatters your frame while providing maximum comfort. Crafted from premium cotton, it's perfect for business casual settings or a night out. Pair it with chinos or jeans to complete your smart look.

name: Waterproof Sports Jacket
label: Jackets
heading: A WATERPROOF JACKET FOR ALL WEATHER CONDITIONS
bodyText: Stay dry and stylish in unpredictable weather with this waterproof sports jacket. Featuring a breathable mesh lining and adjustable cuffs, it provides comfort and protection. Ideal for outdoor activities or everyday wear.

name: Summer Flip Flops
label: Summer
heading: COMFORTABLE FLIP FLOPS FOR THE BEACH
bodyText: Enjoy the summer sun with these lightweight flip flops, designed for comfort and style. The soft foam footbed cushions every step, making them perfect for beach outings, poolside relaxation, or casual walks.

name: Cropped Hoodie
label: Hoodies
heading: A CROPPED HOODIE FOR A TRENDY LOOK
bodyText: Add a modern twist to your casual wardrobe with this cropped hoodie. Featuring a soft, fleece-lined interior and an adjustable hood, it's perfect for layering or wearing on its own. Pair it with high-waisted jeans or joggers for a relaxed, stylish vibe.

name: Puffer Jacket
label: Jackets
heading: A PUFFER JACKET FOR MAXIMUM WARMTH
bodyText: Stay warm without sacrificing style with this puffer jacket, featuring a high neck and zip closure for full protection against the cold. The lightweight insulation provides warmth without the bulk, making it ideal for winter outings.

name: Classic Denim Jacket
label: Jackets
heading: A CLASSIC DENIM JACKET FOR VERSATILE STYLING
bodyText: A wardrobe staple, this classic denim jacket pairs well with almost anything. Made from durable denim with a soft, broken-in feel, it features a button front and multiple pockets for convenience. It's perfect for layering over shirts, hoodies, or dresses.

name: Mesh Running Shirt
label: Sports
heading: A BREATHABLE MESH SHIRT FOR OPTIMAL PERFORMANCE
bodyText: Stay cool and dry on your runs with this mesh running shirt. Designed with moisture-wicking fabric and strategic ventilation, it ensures you stay comfortable even during intense workouts. Reflective details help keep you visible in low light.

name: Training Hoodie
label: Hoodies
heading: A LIGHTWEIGHT HOODIE FOR TRAINING AND LOUNGING
bodyText: Perfect for warming up or cooling down, this training hoodie is crafted from soft, stretchy fabric that moves with you. The adjustable drawcord hood offers extra coverage, while the kangaroo pocket keeps your essentials close at hand.

name: Sun Hat
label: Accessories
heading: A STYLISH SUN HAT FOR PROTECTION AND STYLE
bodyText: Shield yourself from the sun in style with this wide-brimmed hat. Made from lightweight, breathable fabric, it's perfect for beach days, picnics, or outdoor events. The adjustable chin strap ensures it stays in place even on windy days.

name: Ribbed Knit Scarf
label: Accessories
heading: A COZY RIBBED KNIT SCARF FOR COLD WEATHER
bodyText: Wrap yourself in warmth with this ribbed knit scarf, perfect for chilly days. The soft fabric feels great against your skin, and the versatile design makes it easy to pair with any coat or jacket.

name: Leather Belt
label: Accessories
heading: A CLASSIC LEATHER BELT FOR A POLISHED LOOK
bodyText: Complete your outfit with this classic leather belt, featuring a sleek buckle and premium leather construction. Whether you're dressing up or down, this belt adds a touch of refinement to any look.

name: Linen Shirt
label: Shirts
heading: A LIGHTWEIGHT LINEN SHIRT FOR HOT DAYS
bodyText: Keep cool in the heat with this lightweight linen shirt. Breathable and soft, it's perfect for casual summer outings or beach vacations. Roll up the sleeves for a laid-back look or leave them down for a more polished style.

name: Compression Leggings
label: Sports
heading: SUPPORTIVE COMPRESSION LEGGINGS FOR WORKOUTS
bodyText: Maximize your performance with these compression leggings, designed to support your muscles and enhance circulation. The moisture-wicking fabric keeps you dry, while the stretchy material moves with you through every workout.

name: Vintage Graphic Tee
label: Shirts
heading: A VINTAGE GRAPHIC TEE FOR A RETRO LOOK
bodyText: Channel a retro vibe with this vintage graphic tee, featuring bold prints and a relaxed fit. Made from soft cotton, it's perfect for pairing with jeans, shorts, or under a jacket for an effortlessly cool look.

name: Cargo Shorts
label: Summer
heading: PRACTICAL CARGO SHORTS FOR EVERYDAY WEAR
bodyText: Stay prepared for any adventure with these practical cargo shorts. Featuring multiple pockets and a durable fabric, they're ideal for hiking, camping, or casual everyday wear. The relaxed fit ensures comfort in every situation.

name: Thermal Gloves
label: Accessories
heading: THERMAL GLOVES FOR ULTIMATE WARMTH
bodyText: Keep your hands warm in the coldest weather with these thermal gloves. Featuring a soft lining and touch screen-compatible fingertips, these gloves are as functional as they are cozy. Perfect for winter commutes or outdoor activities.
